a1: Although he is a great striker, I'm not a fan of Ronaldo. He is full of himself.
q2: I wonder where Ronaldo will end up over the next few years.
a2: I think he will retire at Juventus.
q3: Do you think he will play many season at Juventus?
a3: I think he will play three or four seasons for them.
a4: Cristiano Ronaldo is a great player!
q5: How much does Cristiano get paid?
